item.title: Nmap Cheatsheet
item.description: Nmap Cheatsheet nmap flag Description -sV Versions -p <x> or -p- Port scan for port or all -Pn Disable host discovery -A Enables OS and version detection, execute built-in scripts -sC Scan with the default nmap scripts -v Verbose mode -sU UDP port scan -sS TCP SYN port scan`
